subSubSection.paragraph: G e n e r a l d i s t r i b u t i o n: Holarctic, Oceanic, Oriental. Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan, Belgium , Bulgaria , China , Croatia , Czech Republic , Czechoslovakia , Finland , France , Germany , Greece , Greenland , Hungary , Ireland , Italy , Japan , Korea , Latvia , Lithuania , Moldova , Mongolia , Netherlands , New Zealand , Norway , Poland , Romania , Russia , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland , Ukraine , United Kingdom , Yugoslavia .
